Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, ENABLE, UNLOCK, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS, PASSWORD, CURRENT_PASSWORD
Application.name: AIX - Direct

entry.key: You are not authorized to change
entry.value: You are not authorized to change password

entry.key: BAD PASSWORD: is too similar to the old one
entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is too similar to the old one.

entry.key: BAD PASSWORD: it is based on a dictionary word
entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is based on a dictionary word.

entry.key: is not in the sudoers file. This incident will be reported.

entry.value: Cannot update the /etc/group or /etc/user_attr file but the login is removed from the /etc/passwd file.
Cannot remove or otherwise modify the home directory.
Invalid command syntax. A usage message for the userdel command is displayed.
The account to be removed does not exist.
The account to be removed is in use.

AttributeDefinition.name: User Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of User

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Id

AttributeDefinition.name: pgrp
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary Group of the User

AttributeDefinition.name: home
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home Directory

AttributeDefinition.name: gecos
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description

AttributeDefinition.name: shell
AttributeDefinition.Description: Shell

AttributeDefinition.name: login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user can log in to the system with the login command

AttributeDefinition.name: su
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether another user can switch to the specified user account with the su command

AttributeDefinition.name: rlogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permits access to the account from a remote location with the telnet or rlogin commands

AttributeDefinition.name: daemon
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user specified by the Name parameter can run programs using the cron daemon or the src (system resource controller) daemon

AttributeDefinition.name: dce_export
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allows the DCE registry to overwrite the local user information with the DCE user information during a DCE export operation

AttributeDefinition.name: admin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrative status of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: sugroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that can use the su command to switch to the specified user account

AttributeDefinition.name: admgroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that the user administrates

AttributeDefinition.name: tpath
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the user's trusted path status

AttributeDefinition.name: ttys
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the terminals that can access the account specified by the Name parameter

AttributeDefinition.name: expires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the expiration date of the account

AttributeDefinition.name: auth1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the primary methods for authenticating the user

AttributeDefinition.name: auth2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the secondary methods used to authenticate the user

AttributeDefinition.name: umask
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines file permissions

AttributeDefinition.name: registry
AttributeDefinition.Description: Registry

AttributeDefinition.name: SYSTEM
AttributeDefinition.Description: SYSTEM

AttributeDefinition.name: logintimes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the days and times that the user is allowed to access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: loginretries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of unsuccessful login attempts allowed after the last successful login before the system locks the account

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdwarntime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of days before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AttributeDefinition.name: account_locked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: minage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum age (in weeks) a password must be before it can be changed

AttributeDefinition.name: maxage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum age (in weeks) of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxexpired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password

AttributeDefinition.name: minalpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minother
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: mindiff
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of characters required in a new password that were not in the old password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxrepeats
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum number of times a character can be repeated in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minlen
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum length of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histexpire
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the period of time (in weeks) that a user cannot reuse a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdchecks
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the password restriction methods enforced on new passwords

AttributeDefinition.name: dictionlist
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the password dictionaries

AttributeDefinition.name: default_roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the default roles for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: fsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the largest file a user's process can create or extend

AttributeDefinition.name: cpu
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the soft limit for the largest amount of system unit time (in seconds) that a user's process can use

AttributeDefinition.name: data
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest data segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: stack
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest process stack segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: core
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest core file a user's process can create

AttributeDefinition.name: rss
AttributeDefinition.Description: The soft limit for the largest amount of physical memory a user's process can allocate

AttributeDefinition.name: nofiles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the number of file descriptors a user process may have open at one time

AttributeDefinition.name: stack_hard
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the largest process stack segment of a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: time_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of seconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970) since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: tty_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the terminal on which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: host_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the host from which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: unsuccessful_login_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The administrative roles for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the groups to which user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: Group Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of Group

AttributeDefinition.name: admin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the administrative status of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The group ID

AttributeDefinition.name: registry
AttributeDefinition.Description: Registry

AttributeDefinition.name: users
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of one or more users in the form: User1,User2,...,Usern. Separate group member names with commas
